users.name: 今天非晴天
users.vDesc: 来世间走一趟，总得留下点什么、收获点什么

items.markText: “No matter how dreary and gray our homes are, we people of flesh and blood would rather live there than in any other country, be it ever so beautiful. There is no place like home.”
Experience is the only thing that brings knowledge, and the longer you are on earth the more experience you are sure to get.

users.name: 孙琳雅
users.vDesc: 培训机构小初英语老师

items.markText: Brains are the only things worth having in this world, no matter whether one is a crow or a man.

users.name: 六小玲潼
users.vDesc: 蓝天白云 马儿草原

items.markText: There is no living thing that is not afraid when it faces danger. True courage is in facing danger when you are afraid, and that kind of courage you have in plenty.”
One glance told her of the danger close at hand.
for brains do not make one happy, and happiness is the best thing in the world.
